title: New: Baby Guru – We Need Some Space
content:
One year and a half after the European release of ”Pieces”, Greek psychedelic pop/folk band Baby Guru return with their new album Marginalia. The first introduction to their upcoming love child comes with the stunning We Need Some Space, a ’70s inspired synth pop with a Bowie-esque gentle glamorous groove diffusing in its artistic circle and flourishing the tone of a classic with its ambitious production! Sir Kosmiche, Prins Obi and King Elephant sail in the sea of the past while dissolving the echoes in the abyss with their own unique signature of this grandiose sonic palette that so gloriously create!

Marginalia LP will drop on March 24th via Inner Ear Records.
